title: Session Start
description: Event emitted when the test session is started.

event.description: The event type. Always set to `session_start`.

session_id.description: The unique if of this test session used to aggregate events together.

timestamp.description: The date and time when the test session was started in ISO 8601 format.

python.description: The Python distribution that is running the tests.

pytest_version.description: The version of pytest that is running the tests.

plugin_version.description: The version of pytest-broadcaster plugin that is used to produce the report.

project.description: The project that is being tested.
